common

类 SimpleTools

  • java.lang.Object
    • common.SimpleTools

  • public class SimpleTools
extends java.lang.Object
    Frequently used functions.
    Project: Java implementation of the AdaBoosting algorithm.
    版本:
    1.0
    作者:
    Fan Min
    www.fansmale.com, github.com/fansmale/MFAdaBoosting.
    Email: minfan@swpu.edu.cn, minfanphd@163.com.
    Date Created: July 20, 2020.
    Last modified: July 20, 2020.

      Track the process?

      • stringToStringArray

        public static java.lang.String[] stringToStringArray(java.lang.String paraString)
                                              throws java.lang.Exception
        Convert a string with commas into a string array, blanks adjacent with commas are deleted. If the string bewteen two adjacent commas are blank or contains only space char ' ', then an exception will be thrown.
        For example, "a, bc, def, g" will be converted into a string array with 4 elements "a", "bc", "def" and "g".
        参数:
        paraString - The source string
        返回:
        A string array.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - Exception for illegal data.
        另请参阅:
        stringArrayToString(java.lang.String[])

      • stringArrayToString

        public static java.lang.String stringArrayToString(java.lang.String[] prmStringArray)
        Convert a string array into a string, elements are separated by commas.
        参数:
        prmStringArray - The source string array
        返回:
        converted string.
        另请参阅:
        stringToStringArray(java.lang.String)

      • addSingleQuotes

        public static java.lang.String addSingleQuotes(java.lang.String prmStringArray)
        Add single quotes for a string (may be an array, elements are separated by commas). This is needed in some SQL statements. For example, "ab,c,d" will be converted into "ab','c','d".
        参数:
        prmStringArray - The source string
        返回:
        converted string.

      • stringArrayContainsString

        public static boolean stringArrayContainsString(java.lang.String prmStringArray,
                                                java.lang.String paraString)
        If the string quisi-array (elements are separated by commas) contains respective attribute.
        For exampe "abc, de" contains "de", but it does not contain "d".
        参数:
        prmStringArray - The string quisi-array (elements are separated by commas).
        paraString - Respect string.
        返回:
        If it is contained.
        另请参阅:
        stringToStringArray(java.lang.String)

      • parseString

        public static java.lang.String[] parseString(java.lang.String paraString,
                                             java.lang.String paraDelimiter,
                                             boolean paraReturnTokens)
        Convert a string with delimiters (such as commas or semi-commas) into a string array.
        This method is more generalized than stringToStringArray because the latter only permits commas to be delimiters. For more detail please contact Liu Qihe
        参数:
        paraString - The given string
        paraDelimiter - The given delimiter
        paraReturnTokens - Is the delimiter permitted after convertion.
        返回:
        string array separated by commas

      • generateString

        public static java.lang.String generateString(java.lang.String[] paraString,
                                              int index)
        Remove string from a string array, and return a string. For more detail please contact Liu Qihe
        参数:
        paraString - 字符串
        index - 去掉串的位?
        返回:
        字符串，属性值之间用逗号分隔.

      • GB2312ToUNICODE

        public static java.lang.String GB2312ToUNICODE(java.lang.String paraString)
        GB2312 to UNICODE. Use this one if Chinese characters is a mess.
        参数:
        paraString - a GB2312 string
        返回:
        a UNICODE string.
        另请参阅:

      • UNICODEToGB2312

        public static java.lang.String UNICODEToGB2312(java.lang.String paraString)
        UNICODE to GB2312. Use this one if Chinese characters is a mess.
        参数:
        paraString - a UNICODE string.
        返回:
        a GB2312 string.
        另请参阅:
        GB2312ToUNICODE(java.lang.String)

      • stringMinusString

        public static java.lang.String stringMinusString(java.lang.String prmFirstString,
                                                 java.lang.String prmSecondString)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        One string minus another, essentially corresponding string arrays.
        E.g., "ab,cd,efa" minus "ab,efa" gets "cd"
        参数:
        prmFirstString - The first string.
        prmSecondString - The second string.
        返回:
        A result string.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if the first string does not contain an element of the second string, e.g., "ab, cd" minus "ab, de". #see scheme.SymbolicPartition .computeOptimalPartitionReduct(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, int)

      • stringUnionString

        public static java.lang.String stringUnionString(java.lang.String prmFirstString,
                                                 java.lang.String prmSecondString)
                                          throws java.lang.Exception
        One string union another, essentially corresponding string sets.
        E.g., "ab,cd,efa" union "ab,ee" gets "ab,cd,efa, ee"
        参数:
        prmFirstString - The first string.
        prmSecondString - The second string.
        返回:
        A result string. #see scheme.Reduction.computeOptimalMReductByEntropy(java.lang.String, java.lang.String, java.lang.String)
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - The exception generated by stringToStringArray(String).

        参数:

        True if it is null or empty.

      • parseIntArray

        public static int[] parseIntArray(java.lang.String paraString,
                                  int paraNumberOfInts,
                                  char paraSeparator)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Read an integer array from a given string. Integers are separated by separators. Author Fan Min.
        参数:
        paraString - The given string.
        paraNumberOfInts - The number of integer to read from the string. If there are more integers, just ignore them.
        paraSeparator - The separator of data, blank and commas are most commonly uses ones.
        返回:
        The constructed array.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - for format.

      • parseDoubleArray

        public static double[] parseDoubleArray(java.lang.String paraString,
                                        int paraNumberOfDoubles,
                                        char paraSeparator)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Read a double array from a given string. Double values are separated by separators.
        Author Fan Min.
        参数:
        paraString - The given string.
        paraNumberOfDoubles - The number of integer to read from the string. If there are more integers, just ignore them.
        paraSeparator - The separator of data, blank and commas are most commonly uses ones.
        返回:
        The constructed array.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - If index out of bounds.

      • parseDoubleArray

        public static double[] parseDoubleArray(java.lang.String paraString)
                                 throws java.lang.Exception
        Read a double array from a given string. The number of doubles are not given, so I will parse as many double values as possible. The seperator is not indicated, so comma is the first candidate, and blank is the second.
        Author Fan Min.
        参数:
        paraString - The given string.
        返回:
        The constructed array.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - if the array length exceeds the bound.

      • doubleArrayToString

                                            throws java.lang.Exception

        参数:
        paraArray - The given array.
        返回:
        The constructed String.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - for empty array.

      • doubleArrayToString

        public static java.lang.String doubleArrayToString(double[] paraArray,
                                                   char paraSeparator)
                                            throws java.lang.Exception
        Conver a double array into a string. Doubles are separated by separators. Author Fan Min.
        参数:
        paraArray - The given array.
        paraSeparator - The separator of data, blank and commas are most commonly uses ones.
        返回:
        The constructed String.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - for null or empty array.

      • booleanArrayToString

        public static java.lang.String booleanArrayToString(boolean[] paraArray,
                                                    char paraSeparator)
        Convert a boolean array into a string. Booleans are separated by separators.
        参数:
        paraArray - The given array.
        paraSeparator - The separator of data, blank and commas are most commonly uses ones.
        返回:
        The constructed String.

      • stringToBooleanArray

        public static boolean[] stringToBooleanArray(java.lang.String paraString,
                                             char paraSeparator)
                                      throws java.lang.Exception
        Convert a string array into a boolean array. Booleans are separated by separators. Only support 0 and 1 in the string. TRUE and FALSE are not supported.
        参数:
        paraString - The given string.
        paraSeparator - The separator of data, blank and commas are most commonly uses ones.
        返回:
        The constructed String.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - for wrong format.

      • parseIntArray

        public static int[] parseIntArray(java.lang.String paraString)
                           throws java.lang.Exception
        Read a int array from a given string. The number of ints are not given, so I will parse as many int values as possible. The seperator is not indicated, so comma is the first candidate, and blank is the second.
        Author Fan Min.
        参数:
        paraString - The given string.
        返回:
        The constructed array.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception - For format error.

        public static char subSetCheck(long paraFirstSet,
                               long paraSecondSet,
                               int paraNumberOfConditions)
        Check Who is who's subset.
        参数:
        paraFirstSet - the first set in long.
        paraSecondSet - the second set in long.
        paraNumberOfConditions - the number of conditions.
        返回:
        '0' means no relationship, '1' means the second is the subset, '2' means the first is the subset, '3' means equal.

                                                         int[][] paraSecondSetFamily)
        Compute the maximal intersections of two set families. These sets families should be composed by exactly two sets.
        参数:
        paraFirstSetFamily - The first set family, e.g., [[1, 3, 5, 7], [0, 2, 4, 6]].
        paraSecondSetFamily - The second set family, e.g., [[1, 2, 3], [0, 4, 5, 6, 7]].
        返回:
        the maximal intersection family.
